subject: Tennis
Australian Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Caroline Wozniacki beat Dominika Cibulkova in straight sets, and Novak Djokovic advanced to the fourth round after playing just one set against Viktor Troicki.
snippet: Caroline Wozniacki beat Dominika Cibulkova in straight sets, and Novak Djokovic advanced to the fourth round after playing just one set against Viktor Troicki.
